title: Exclusive: Watchdog to probe alleged mustard gas use by Islamic State
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
THE HAGUE (Reuters) - Islamic State militants "most probably" used the banned chemical weapon mustard gas against Kurdish forces in Iraq and...
